name: Wellbeing & Health
description: Improving quality of life through affecting the physical, psychological, environmental and social determinants of health and wellbeing.

name: Spirituality & Religion
description: World beyond the material and the rational.

name: Development & Growth
description: Fostering personal development and growth in emotional, psychological, social and other internal capacities.

name: Community
description: Role of community in human life and the fostering human flourishing, and approaches to building, sustaining and governing communities.

name: Politics & Economics
description: Engaging with existing political and economic systems, creating policies and innovating new approaches to politics and economics.

name: Governance & Institutions
description: Devising new forms of governance and institutions to support alternative social paradigms.

name: Future of work
description: Innovating the world of work, including through new methods and approaches to business and organisational management.

name: Arts & Culture
description: Role and use of arts and culture in fostering social change.

name: Ecology & Environment
description: Issues relating to the environment, including climate change but also nature more broadly and human relationships to it.

name: Technology & Blockchain
description: Use of technological innovation, including blockchain, to foster social change and support new social systems.
